pages.text:
[Page Title: Big Billy's Burger Joint in North Charleston Tanger]

PREMIUM MEATS AND WILD GAME BURGERS Our Menu SHAKE IT UP WITH OUR DELICIOUS HAND-SPUN MILKSHAKES VIEW OUR DELICIOUS HAND-SPUN MILKSHAKES DRINKS FOR ADULT SURFERS VIEW OUR ALCOHOL-INFUSED DELICIOUSNESS 
A GREAT REASON TO GO WILD EACH DAY OF THE WEEK

WE PROUDLY FEATURE NATURAL, FREE RANGE, GRASS-FED AND WILD GAME BURGERS – 100% ANTIBIOTIC & HORMONE FREE.
Part of what sets Big Billy’s Burger Joint apart is our versatility. We proudly feature different special burger meat of the day, every day, a phenomenon that we refer to as our “Wild Game” burgers. Each of our daily burger specials shares a few things in common, though- they’re natural, free-range, grass-fed, and wild-game burgers- 100% antibiotic and free of hormones. Check out our menu to see what the special is today! 
Would you like to bring the beach vibe and delectable food of our Big Billy’s dream into your home? Now you can place an order online, using either Doordash or UberEats.
ORDER ONLINE 
OUR CUSTOMERS ARE OUR DREAM

Our founders Greg and Ellen Leonard have always shared a unique dream. That dream was to have a restaurant near the ocean for beachgoers to frequent during their lunch breaks. After all, at some point amidst a long day of soaking up the sun’s rays and splashing around in the pristine water of the Atlantic Ocean, people need to supply themselves with nourishment. Thus, Big Billy’s Burger Joint was founded, and the shared dream of Greg and Ellen Leonard was turned into a reality.

When you walk through the front doors of Big Billy’s Burger Joint, you aren’t setting foot inside just another restaurant. You’re setting foot inside a restaurant that our owners have always yearned to own. Our customers aren’t merely customers to us, they are the lifeblood that keeps our dream afloat. When we prepare one of our sensational entrées, it’s prepared with the inherent realization that we are living our dream. Conversely, when you enjoy one of our sensational entrées, you are experiencing a part of something our owners have dreamed about for years.

Nowhere else will you sink your teeth into a meal that was prepared by people who have made it their mission in life to see you happily enjoying that meal. Nowhere else will be on the receiving end of customer service from people who are so genuinely thrilled to see your satisfaction. Nowhere else can you get the overall experience that you will get at Big Billy’s Burger Joint.
OUR MENU 
SEE WHAT’S COOKING AT BIG BILLY’S!
Follow Follow Follow 
What’s on tap at Big Billy’s

We offer a variety of local and national beers based on the season. Give us a call to find out what’s on tap today.

We often feature Holy City, Commonhouse Aleworks, Frothy Beard, and Cooper River Brewing.
Catering 
We deliver major meals for major occasions! Are you planning a large business conference, event, or seminar? Are you looking for just the right restaurant to cater your wedding, birthday party, or family reunion? Big Billy’s Burger Joint can do that! Check out our catering page to learn more.
Learn More 
FIND US

Would you like to get in touch with our team at Big Billy’s Burger Joint? Feel free to reach out, and we’ll address your questions and comments as quickly as possible.

5070 International BlvdNorth Charleston, SC 29418
FIND US

[Page Title: Specials | Big Billy's Burger Joint]

Specials

You’ve probably eaten pig meat before, but we’ll bet you’ve never eaten pig meat like our wild boar!

Taste the meat of the reptiles from the swamps of Florida and Louisiana with our special alligator entrée!

Bison are extremely high in protein, and boy does they sure taste delicious! That’s why we couldn’t help but offer bison as our wild-game burger not just once, but twice a week!

The ultimate exotic meat experience. What might we be cooking up today? Whatever it is, we can assure you it’s delicious! Ask your server about what the owner’s choice specialty is this week!

As promised, we can’t limit our preparation of this spectacular treat to just once a week, so we offer bison as a daily special on Fridays, too!

On top of being rich with flavor, venison contains very little saturated fat, which means that it’s one of those meals that will make your heart happy!

Treat yourself to a true taste of the forest with our Sunday special. Our elk-based entrées are so fresh and delectable that you won’t be able to help but feel like you were there when it was captured!

MAIN MENU
Not feeling like going wild today? Not a problem, maybe some other day- and in the meanwhile, we’re certainly one of our more traditional menu options will hit the spot for you. Check out our main menu page and see what looks good to you today! VIEW MENU 
What’s on tap at Big Billy’s

Terrapin ‘Los Bravos’Wicked Weed Pernicious IPAGolden Road Mango CartSweetwater ‘Hazy 710’ Pale AleFrothy Beard ‘Tides of Galinay’ RedSteel Hands Hazy IPABudlightNew Belgium ‘Citrus Rescue’ IPA

We take care of those who take care of us

Perhaps there’s no better way to thank those who serve our country than by giving them discounts on their delicious meals. Show us your military ID, and 10% of your bill is on the house. It’s our way of saying thank you for defending our country.
Catering 
We deliver major meals for major occasions! Are you planning a large business conference, event, or seminar? Are you looking for just the right restaurant to cater your wedding, birthday party, or family reunion? Big Billy’s Burger Joint can do that! Check out our catering page to learn more.
Learn More

[Page Title: Big Billy's Menu | Local Charleston Restaurant]

MENU

MENU

MENU

BEACH BUM APPS
Start your beach experience off right with some of the best appetizers you’ll ever sink your teeth into. 
Fried Green Tomatoes and Fried Green beans

Five fresh battered green tomatoes and a basket of Green Beans with a side of Pimento cheese and Chipotle Ranch Dressing for dipping. 10.99

BIG BILLY’S FRIES

Double order of fries topped with house made queso, cheddar and jack cheese and bacon. Served with Ranch and our Billy’s sauce. 9.95Top it with fried or grilled chicken add $4.00

Buffalo chicken dip

Served hot with garlic bread and chips for dipping. 12.50

BIG BILLY’S LOADED NACHOS

A boatload of tortilla chips overloaded with house-made chili, queso, cheddar and Jack cheese, jalapeños, fresh pico and sour cream 11.99Add Guacamole 1.99 | Add Beef or Chicken 4.99

Famous fried pickles

House-made pickles, lightly breaded and served with honey horseradish sauce! 9.99

JALAPENO POPPERS

Jalapeno poppers filled with cream cheese served with sweet chili sauce and ranch dressing. 10.99

Billy’s Best-Ever Onion Rings

A crazy big portion of hand-cut, hand-breaded, sweet onion rings served like you’ve never seen before and accompanied by our Big Billy’s sauce. 10.99

Wings your way

Eight jumbo chicken wings in your choice of: mild, hot, dryranch, island jerk, teriyaki, lemon pepper, sweet chili, garlic parmesan,kicken bourbon, or BBQ. Served with celery sticks and either bleucheese or ranch dressing. (8) 13.99 / (12) 16.99
{ 
A must stop for burgers and milkshake lovers.
{ 
Sausage/Dogs

Dog On the Beach

A jumbo, quarter-pound, all-beef hot dog, served on a fresh baked hoagie bun. Make this dog bark and build your own! 11.99
Billy suggests adding chili, queso, and red onions for an additional charge. 
Billy’s Burger Favorites
We are, after all, a burger joint! And as such, we’ve got plenty of delicious burger options for you to fill up on. From Patty Melts to Mac & Cheese Burgers and everything in between, you can’t go wrong with any of our Big Billy’s signature burgers. SERVED WITH HOUSE PICKLES AND YOUR CHOICE OF FRIES, HOUSE-MADE KETTLE CHIPS, TOTS OR COLESLAW Sweet Potato Fries or Fried Pickles 1.99 UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM SIDE: Onion Rings, Steamed Broccoli, Side Salad 2.99 
BREAKFAST BURGER

Served with a fried egg, Applewood smoked bacon, grilled black forest ham, hash browns, and American cheese. G’Day! 15.99Did someone say Bloody Mary? Billy did!

CLASSIC CHEESEBURGER

Served with your choice of cheese, green leaf lettuce, tomato, sliced red onion, and dill pickles. Simply wonderful! 14.25

BACON X3 BURGER

Served with bacon on top, bacon below, and topped with our own bacon mayo. Served with choice of cheese, lettuce, and tomato. Dreams do come true! 15.25

New! Heart Stopper

Our house-ground burger topped with sharp cheddar, provolone and swiss cheese, egg, bacon, and ham! 15.99

MAC & CHEESE BURGER

Topped with American cheese, fried mac & cheese, bacon, and queso. 15.99

ChILI BURGER

Topped with chili, American cheese, mustard, and house-fried kettle chips piled high! Get smashing! 15.25

New! Fiesta Burger

Topped with pepper jack cheese, house-made pico de gallo, nacho strips, and queso cheese 14.99

BILLY’S PATTY MELT

Fresh, hand ground beef with sautéed onions, Swiss cheese, and garlic mayo on marble rye 15.25

New! Western

Our house ground burger topped with a hand breaded onion ring, lettuce tomato, and BBQ sauce 14.99

New! Southern Fried

Topped with lettuce, a fried green tomato, house-made pimento cheese, and bacon 14.99

New! Belt Buster

A double burger topped with your choice of cheese with a grilled cheese in the middle with lettuce tomato and onions. 18.99 Ask about our Belt Buster Challenge!

Build Your Own
Get creative and build your own burger! We’ve got beef, grilled chicken breasts, turkey burgers, and more! SERVED WITH HOUSE PICKLES AND YOUR CHOICE OF FRIES, HOUSE-MADE KETTLE CHIPS, TOTS OR COLESLAW Sweet Potato Fries or Fried Pickles 1.99 UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM SIDE: Onion Rings, Steamed Broccoli, Side Salad 2.99 FRESH, IN HOUSE GROUND BEEF

MAHI MAHI BEACH BURRITO

Mahi mahi, grilled with fajita spice, rolled with chipotle aioli, shredded cabbage, mango jalapeño salsa, black beans, cheddar and Jack cheese, allon a grilled soft flour tortilla as only Big Billy can do! 14.99

FRIED CHICKEN PIMENTO BLT

Fried chicken topped with housemade pimento cheese, lettuce,tomato and crisp bacon 14.99

SAIL AWAY SALMON BLT

Fillet of Atlantic salmon grilled and served on toasted sourdough bread with fresh tomatoes, Applewood smoked bacon, green leaf lettuce and roasted garlic mayo 15.99 Try it blackened with an ice-cold Pale Ale!

CHICKEN CLUB WRAP

A grilled chicken breast served in a flour tortilla with garlic mayo, shredded cheddar and jack, black forest ham, Applewood smoked bacon, green leaf lettuce, and tomato 14.50

BILLY’S CORNED BEEF REUBEN

Sliced house corned beef, swiss cheese with sauerkraut and house-made dressing on marbled rye. 14.99

BIG BILLY’S GRILLED 3-CHEESE & BACON

Sharp cheddar, smoked Gouda and Brie all accompanied by Applewood smoked bacon, sliced tomato and garlic mayo, grilled on fresh baked sourdough 14.99Add fresh, hand ground beef 4.50

New! Chicken Tender Platter

3 chicken tenders served with a side of coleslaw and choice of side and honey mustard. 14.99

Billy’s GONE GREEN

COZUMEL SALAD

Mixed greens with guacamole, sour cream, roasted corn, shreddedcheddar and Jack cheese, tortilla chips, and pico de gallo with chipotle ranch dressing. 12.75Black Bean 13.99 | Fresh, hand-ground beef 15.99

FARMER’S MARKET SALAD WITH SALMON

Baby spinach topped withstrawberries, sliced apples, mango,toasted coconut, Mandarin oranges,candied pecans and feta cheeseserved with our own raspberrybalsamic vinaigrette 15.50

-Try it blackened with a specialty handmade shake!

GREEK ISLANDS SALAD

Chopped romaine lettuce with diced tomatoes, red onions,black olives, cucumbers, pepperoncini peppers, feta cheese and Greek vinaigrette 12.99 • Add Chicken 14.99

MALIBU SALAD

Mixed greens with diced tomatoes, red onions, cucumbers, shredded cheese and croutons 12.99Add Salmon 15.99 / Chicken 14.99 / Mahi 13.99

SURFIN’ CAESAR SALAD

Chopped romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese and herb croutons 11.99

With Chicken 13.99 -Try it blackened with a cold IPA!

shake it up

BEGINNERS – 5.75CHOCOLATE | VANILLA | STRAWBERRY

ADVANCED – 6.75

OH! OREO!

Vanilla ice cream, Oreo cookies, and more Oreo cookies.

STRAWBERRY SHORTCAKE

Vanilla ice cream, fresh strawberries, strawberry syrup, and shortcake.

CHOCOPEANUTBUTTER BROWNIE

Vanilla ice cream, peanut butter, chocolate syrup, and brownie chunks.

CAMPFIRE S’MORES

Vanilla ice cream, chocolate syrup, toasted marshmallows, and graham crackers.

COOKIE MONSTER

Chip Ahoy cookies, vanilla ice cream, caramel, and chocolate!

SALTED CARMEL TOFFEE
Salted Caramel, Crushed Toffee Pieces, Vanilla Ice Cream. 
BANANA PUDDING
Banana Pure, Crumbled vanilla Wafers, Vanilla Ice Cream. 
BUTTER PECAN
Crushed Pecan Pieces, Butter Pecan Flavor, Vanilla Ice Cream. 
ADULT SURFERS ONLY – 8.75
(alcohol-infused deliciousness!) 
MIND TRICK

Bailey’s, Captain Morgan, Kahlua and Amaretto blended with vanilla ice cream.

VANILLA CARAMEL SWIRL

Crown Royal Vanilla blended with vanilla ice cream and caramel.

APPLE PIE

Crown Royal Regal Apple blended with vanilla ice cream and caramel.

MUDSLIDE BILL

Bailey’s, Frangelico, Kahlua blended with vanilla ice cream and chocolate syrup.

CHOCOLATE PB CUP

Screwball whiskey, crème De Cocoa and crushed PB cup pieces.

CHOCOLATE MINT COOKIE MANIA

Bailey’s, Crème de Menthe and Crème de Cacao, mint cookies, blended with vanilla ice cream.

BANANA SPLAT

Captain Morgan Coconut Rum, Banana Liqueur and Crème de Cacao blended with vanilla ice cream. Topped with whipped cream and nutmeg.

LOOPY FRUIT
Three Olives Loopy Vodka, Fruity Pebble Cereal Pieces, Vanilla Ice Cream 
Cocktails

SPECIALTY COCKTAILS

SPIKED TEA
Locally Distilled Sweet Tea Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Unsweetened Tea, Splash of Lemonade. 
CHARLESTON MARY
Charleston Bold and Spicy Bloody Mary Mix, Dixie Black Pepper Vodka garnished with pepper, celery, and bacon. 
BIG BILLY’S MAI TAI
Admiral Nelson’s Coconut Rum and Admiral Nelson’s Pineapple Rum mixed with fresh fruit juices topped with a Captain Morgan Black Rum Floater. 
PINEAPPLE JALAPENO MARGARITA
Jose Cuervo Tequila, pineapple juice, Jalapeño Infusion, fresh pineapple, fresh lime, and triple sec 
HURRICANE
Admiral Nelson’s Rum and Captain Morgan Black Rum mixed with fresh lime, orange juice, peach schnapps, and grenadine. 
PEACH ON THE BEACH
Crown Royal Peach, Cranberry Juice, Orange Juice. 
THE CHARLESTON MULE
Virgil Kaine Ginger Bourbon, lime juice, and ginger beer. 
FROZEN COCKTAILS

FROZEN SCREWDRIVER
Tito’s Handmade Vodka and orange juice with a Grand Marnier Floater. 
MARGARITA
Classic lime, peach, strawberry, or mango with house tequila served with salt or sugar rim. 
DAIQUIRIS
Classic lime, peach, strawberry or mango with Admiral Nelson’s Rum topped with whipped cream and fresh fruit. 
PINA COLADA
Admiral Nelson’s Coconut Rum blended with pineapple juice and piña colada mix. 
WINES
THE SEEKER PINOT GRIGIO THE SEEKER SAUVIGNON BLANC THE SEEKER CHARDONNAY THE SEEKER PINOT NOIR THE SEEKER CABERNET SAUVIGNON
